Author: oh_not_again_01
Text: I did the exact same thing when I gained weight. That was 4 years ago. I lost all of those friendships, except a friend whom I chat with but haven't seen in all this time. I just want to avoid the judgemental comments and looks, ugh, I get you. It's genuine fear and embarrassment. However, I hope you find the motivation to see them. ED's are experts on breaking bonds with others
